display.title: Working With Leather
display.description: Drop a Fleece, Iron Nail & Leather (Mob Specific) onto a Fletching Table, along with an already Trimmed piece of Armor to convert it to a new Leather Trim [Required: 1x Fleece 1x Iron Nail 1x Unique Leather 1x Any Trimmed Armor Piece | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
